wikipedia_page.main: Jonathan Francis "Jon" Kay (born 8 November 1969 in Hull, East Riding of Yorkshire) is an English television presenter, newsreader and journalist based in the West of England known for his work on BBC News.

response: The Xpression FM news team have had many successful broadcast journalists as part of their team. These include the BBC's Ruth Lovell and Dan O'Brien, as well as Jon Kay.
